publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-312 Hugh O’Donnell: Cumbernauld Minor Injuries Unit—That the Parliament believes that there must be no delay in building the new minor injuries unit in Cumbernauld and calls on the Scottish Executive to ensure that any review of NHS Lanarkshire’s document, A Picture of Health, retains the previous commitment to build the new minor injuries unit in Cumbernauld town centre.
S3M-312 Cumbernauld Minor Injuries Unit (lodged on 24 July 2007) Jim Hume*, Ross Finnie*, Robert Brown*, Mike Rumbles*
S3M-312 Cumbernauld Minor Injuries Unit (lodged on 24 July 2007) Karen Gillon*
S3M-312 Cumbernauld Minor Injuries Unit (lodged on 24 July 2007) Hugh Henry*
